channel.title: CVE Feed for EBM Technologies -- Uniweb/SoliPACS WebServer
channel.description: The latest CVEs for EBM Technologies -- Uniweb/SoliPACS WebServer

item.title: CVE-2024-26262|2024-02-15T02:40:08.269Z -- EBM Technologies -- Uniweb/SoliPACS WebServer
item.description: EBM Technologies Uniweb/SoliPACS WebServer's query functionality lacks proper restrictions of user input, allowing remote attackers authenticated as regular user to inject SQL commands for reading, modifying, and deleting database records, as well as executing system commands. Attackers may even leverage the dbo privilege in the database for privilege escalation, elevating their privileges to administrator .
